Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.listeners

Class ChunkListener

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.listeners.AbstractListener
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.listeners.ChunkListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRestartable, org.bukkit.event.Listener
@Singleton public class ChunkListener extends AbstractListener
Represents a listener that keeps track of chunks being unloaded.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onChunkLoad(org.bukkit.event.world.ChunkLoadEvent event)
    Listens to chunks being loaded and ensures that AbstractStructure.onChunkLoad() is called for any structures whose rotation point lies in the chunk that is being loaded.
    void
    onChunkUnload(org.bukkit.event.world.ChunkUnloadEvent event)
    Listens to chunks being unloaded and checks if it intersects with the region of the active AbstractStructures.
